column4: Hey, is there a way to merge unallocated space into another partition ?
Sorry for late reply, but htp://up.ppy.sh/files/screenshot-4.png
I'd like to grow sda4 or sda2
I don't have experience with resizing windows  - but I would definitely do a backup before you try anything.
I don't know what to try, even if I do
you would want to boot from a live CD to try the resizing - you don't want file systems mounted when you do that
yes use a live cd - the program Gparted
is windows your default boot - first boot option?
is that the way you want it?

after you back up your stuff, boot from the live cd and find the app "Gparted" - just like the screen shot.  Then click on the partition you want to work with and you should be able to drap the partition larger or smaller  - it may take some time - usually does.  Once everything looks the way you want, tell gparted to execute the reszining, etc.
